name: Hotel on the Grate
description:
Hotel on the Grate is a short, (like 15 to 20 minutes) narrative adventure game. Assume the role of an on call therapist and travel across the city on the grate to meet your patients.


Features Include:

Meet and talk to interesting characters!

Track progress with your Journal!

Explore multiple locations!

Diverse music!

At least ten words of dialog!

At least ten minutes of gameplay!

Developed in the Godot engine
